name: Crystalized Vengeance Demo
description:
I made short game demo with RPG Maker MV. It's about a man called Ludvig Rareroot and Leo Caelum. Their goal is to become great Beast Hunter and Beast Researcher duo. But is it really what Ludvig wants or does he has other objects?

This is my first game that I ever published and so I apologize in advance if there is problem or two in it. Please feel free to comment and give your opinion.
